profileAlternative.name: Chandhini Chandersekar
profileAlternative.headline: Full stack developer | Front End | UI | Web Development | Machine learning | Data Mining
profileAlternative.summary: A detail-oriented programmer with the ability to code, analyze and engineer productive solutions. Expert in learning-edge programming tools with the ability to assimilate and utilize emerging technologies. Proficient at front-end development, deployment, formulating tests, designing and maintaining databases and developing efficient software. Building state-of-the-art user-friendly applications have always been my passion. I also possess a great eye for design, which I believe adds uniqueness to every web application I have built by far.

positions.title: Software Engineer Co-op
positions.description:
• Developed features in the promotion engine using MEAN stack that uses grunt, CircleCI,Docker, AWS with Elastic Beanstalk- https://www.oneviewcommerce.com/promotions-engine
• Built several typescript modules with unit tests for the upgraded POS system and dealt with implementation of handlebars for various POS receipt printers
• Daily responsibilities included developing new features, code reviewing, maintaining internal testing environments, grooming stories and sprint planning with the business team
